resources.string: Error fetching security keys, please try again.
There are no security keys registered to your account. To add a security key use the Proton web application. %s
These are the security keys registered to your account.
To manage, add, or remove security keys, please use the Proton web application. %s
To improve our services, we sometimes collect anonymized usage data.
If the app crashes, a report will be sent to our engineers with details of the cause. We\'ll only use these to improve the app.
